data.title: Ed Sheeran May Not Be The Least Likely Of Eminem's Celebrity Connections
data.meta_description: Ed Sheeran has always stated his admiration for rapper Eminem. The two collaborated in several performances and have praised each other time and time again. While Sheeran is a dear friend to Slim Shady, the latter is also known to be friends with many other influential artists in Hollywood.
data.text:
Highlights

Ed Sheeran and Eminem have a detailed friendship, participating on more than one songs and appearing together on stage.

Eminem has a long record of buddies in Hollywood, including Dr. Dre, 50 Cent, and Rihanna, among many others.

Eminem's friendship with Elton John is especially vital and enduring, as they've supported each other through private challenges and continue to have regular conversations.

Ed Sheeran has at all times said his admiration for rapper Eminem. The two collaborated in numerous performances and feature praised each different time and time once more. While Sheeran is an expensive buddy to Slim Shady, the latter is also recognized to be buddies with many different influential artists in Hollywood.

Given Eminem's fruitful occupation as a musician, his generous spirit, and his worldwide status as a world icon, his record of pals is unquestionably lengthy. However, there are fairly a couple of who're recognized to be closest to him, namely Rihanna, Dr. Dre, and 50 Cent.

RELATED: Eminem: All The Good And Bad Things Other Celebs Have Said About Him

He is also said to have been friends with late actor Brittany Murphy whom he met while filming the movie 8 Mile. While Eminem did not ascertain his alleged romance with Murphy, the actress had as soon as confirmed that she was once relationship the rapper. During an interview with David Letterman in her 2002 look on The Late Show, Murphy said that their off-camera relationship went âwell.â

Murphy and Eminem may had been lovers, but Eminem may be identified to have some forged buddies in Hollywood, one of them being Ed Sheeran. The two have launched songs, specifically "River," "In Your Head," "Remember The Name," and "Chloraseptic." They have performed together rather incessantly, however even the fan-favorite Sheeran is not Eminem's most interesting connection.

Ed Sheeran Has Always Been A Fan Of Eminem

Ed Sheeran had as soon as flaunted his rapping skills in Eminem's song âKill You.â While Sheeran does not rap in his songs professionally, he did not hesitate to drop the bars while honoring one of his favorite rappers.

The "Perfect" singer additionally invited Eminem to be his visitor performer at one of his concerts at Ford Field in Detroit and all the way through an intimate performance at the Royal Oak Music Theatre.

In the live performance, Sheeran first requested the target market if he could play a cover of Eminemâs music for them. The "Shape Of You" singer then invited âSlim Shadyâ on degree where they carried out his hit songs âLose Yourselfâ and âStan.â Sheeran coated the parts that were initially performed by Dido.

While chatting with the target market in Detroit, Eminem stated, âDetroit, I neglected youâ¦ I appreciate you, Detroit. I like you.â

RELATED: 15 Things We've Learned From Eminem's Recent Interview With KXNG Crooked

Not simplest that, Eminem and Sheeran also sang the same song together all through the 2022 Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction rite.

Ed Sheeran had in the past expressed his love for Eminem and printed that the rapperâs songs helped him cure his stutter as a kid.

In an interview on The Howard Stern Show, Sheeran additionally unfolded on admiring Eminem's approach towards fame and life.

While calling the rapper "reclusive," he noted, "I've known him now six years, and we've done three songs together, I've played with him twice on stage. He's another person I really relate to, as he lives in his hometown still and has his ecosystem around him."

Eminem Is Friends With Ed, And Plenty Of Other Musicians

Not best Ed Sheeran, but Eminem has many musician friends with whom he's very close. The rapper is shut friends with 50 Cent with whom he additionally carried out finally yearâs Super Bowl Halftime Show.

While a part of Eminem's performance had given rise to new controversies regarding a symbolic stance, the display also witnessed his camaraderie together with his long-time pal, 50 Cent.

Sharing a photo of him and Eminem on his social media platform, 50 Cent wrote, âThis friendship is never gonna trade.â In truth, 50 Cent could also be signed to Eminemâs recording label Shady Records.

The latter honored 50 Cent with a celeb on the Hollywood Walk Of Fame to express his appreciation for his âbusiness partnerâ and âfriend.â

The two buddies also collaborated with Ed Sheeran in his hip-hop-based track âRemember The Name.â

Eminem is also pals with Dr. Dre. The rapper found out Eminemâs music attainable and signed him in 1998. As said earlier, Slim Shady is close to Rihanna. The two collaborated on a number of tracks and co-headlined a tour in 2014.

His musician buddies also include Nicki Minaj, whom he also reportedly secretly dated, Snoop Dogg, P!nk, Lil Wayne, Jack Harlow, and Lady Gaga, with some of whom Eminem has collaborated on a number of tracks.

However, his friendship with Elton John is the maximum talked-about ever since they performed in combination at the 2001 Grammy Awards.

Eminem Might Be Controversial, But He Has Many Celebrity Friends, Including Sir Elton John

Eminem is also close with Blink 182âs drummer Travis Barker. The latter remixed a number of tracks for Eminem and the duo has carried out several live displays together. Rapper and songwriter Jay-Z could also be recognized to be Eminemâs close buddy. Moreover, actor Jonah Hill may be recognized to be one of Eminemâs closest pals.

No topic who Mathers is pals with, there may be at all times some point out of his long-term friendship with Elton John. The two were inseparable ever since they collaborated as musicians and their friendship is one for the historical past books.

While recalling their first assembly, Elton John quipped on The Graham Norton Show that they was âsuperb buddiesâ from the second they met. The "Tiny Dancer" singer also stated that he adores the rapper for being an âwonderful guy.â

RELATED: Eminem And Elton John: 15 Sweet Facts About Their Relationship

It is definitely not uncommon for musicians to be buddies. However, Eminem has won a considerable quantity of backlash for the usage of homophobic lyrics in his songs.

As John himself identifies as homosexual, Eminem had once referred to his friendship with the "Iâm Still Standing" singer all over his interview with MTV in 2004.

He mentioned, "I didnât know he [Elton John] was gay. I didnât know anything about his personal life. I didnât really careâ¦ But being that he was gay, and he had my back, I think it made a statement in itself saying that he understood where I was coming from."

In an interview with The Guardian, Eminem additionally referred to his drug addiction and the person that he called first when he decided to get sober. He stated that he reached out to the singer and asked for his advice. John himself overcame his cocaine addiction in the '90s which should have helped him guide the rapper in his journey to sobriety.

The two reportedly have conversations over the telephone and Elton has also admitted to being a Marshall Mathers fan himself!
